price: 28. Ils disent : « À quand donc cette victoire, si ce que vous dites est vrai ? »
arabic: وَيَقُولُونَ مَتَىٰ هَٰذَا ٱلۡفَتۡحُ إِن كُنتُمۡ صَٰدِقِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wayaqūlūna matā hādhā al-fatḥu in kuntum ṣādiqīna
